stories.text:
Hey HN gang -

Looking for the best AI chatbot (API) which can handle general conversation, to use as back end of a mobile app. Think: user speech-to-text (voice recognition), AI chat bot service, text-to-speech back to the user.

Would love to hear HN's suggestions & experiences.
